page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE IN PAISLEY CONT.
page.content:
Teatime sees us together for sausage rolls and chips. Afterwards Dad stays behind to paint Murray's room while Mum, Murray and I walk to Barshaw Park to play on the swings and meet with friends. On the way back we stop for chips and on our return we settle in front of the T.V. to enjoy a few programmes - Dynasty, Sportscene and the Kenny Everett Show.
Mum prefers the radio and settles down to a good play in another room. We go to bed at ten o'clock to read a little before going to sleep. Nancy Drew is my favourite author at the moment.
